welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Magna, a charming city known for its rich history and warm hospitality. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights at Salt Lake City International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights at Salt Lake City International Airport.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The terminal for all international flights at Salt Lake City International Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
